projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
tribhuvaṉaccakkravattikaḷ kulottuṇka
coḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu 4 vatu irājā
dhirājavaḷanāṭṭu tirukkaḻumalanāṭṭu bra
hmadecam tirukkaḻumalam kaṟkaṭakanāyaṟu
mutal kirāmakāriyañceykiṟakūṭṭayāvarumkku
tirumāḷikai āḷuṭaiyapiḷḷaiyār tirumāḷikai tamiḻ virakar
kaṇṭu ikkoyiṟtirukkaikoṭṭiyil eḻuntaruḷi irukkiṟa tirumuṟaikaḷ tirukkā
ppu nikki aḻivuḷḷiṉa eḻuntaruḷivittum maṟṟum putitāka eḻuntaruḷivikku
m tirumuṟaikaḷ
iṟaiyiliyāka iṭṭa nilam ivvūr caṇṭeśvaravatikkuk kiḻakku niṉṟā
nvāykkālukku vaṭakku mutaṟkaṇṇāṟṟu iraṇṭāñcatirattu kiḻ iṟaiyā
ṇkuṭṭi pāl pārattūvāci śrīkāḻināṭuṭaiyāṉ tiruveṇkāṭuṭaiyāṉ nila
viḷai 2½ ½ iṉṉilam irumāvarai araikkāṇi muntirikai
iṉṉilañcūḻnta kulaiyum tiṭalum kuḷamum kiḻkkaṭainta coḻa
meṟkaṭaiya kuṭiyirupputtiṭar ṉilamum cuttamalivatikku meṟku ṉiṉṟā
ṉvāykkālukku vaṭakku mutaṟkaṇṇāṟṟu 3n catirattu pālāśrīyan māte
vaṉṉilattu vaṭameṟkaṭaiyap puṉceynilattu uṭaiya punceynilam
uḷpaṭak kaikkoṇṭu cantirātittavarai kācu koḷḷā iṟai
yiliyākavum cilvari peruvari veṭṭi muṭṭaiyāḷ koḷḷātomākavum co
ṉṉom iṉṉilaṇkaikkoṇṭu aṉupavittu tirumuṟai tirukkāppuṉikki ippaṭiye
tirumāḷikaiyile kalliluñcempilum veṭṭikkoḷka paṇiyāl uṟkaṇakkup pa
piriyaṉ eḻuttu sabhaiyāril eḻuttiṭṭār pārattuvāci tevakaṉ ceṉāpanampi mā
ṭilaṉ civatevaṉ tiruttoṇipuramuṭaiyāṉ pārattuvāci tevaṉ tillaināyakaṉ vā
jyan kalikaṭintāṉ
maikku paṭṭappiriyaṉ eḻuttu vājyan kumāraṉ kuṉāṉa tiruveṇkāṭuṭaiyāṉāṉa tirum
āḷikai ṉampi pālāśrīyan tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭai-yāṉ saijñā
taṉamaikkup paṭṭappiriyaṉ vājyan arukkaṉ āḷuṭaiyāṉ pālāśrīyaṉ kumaraṉ nīlaka
ṇṭaṉ pālāśrīyaṉ piraḷayaviṭaṇkaṉ tiruttoṇipuramuṭaiyāṉ vājyaṉ tevaṉ tirut
toṇipuramuṭaiyāṉ saijñātaṉamaikku paṭṭappiriyaṉ cāpānaticeṉtaṉ vira-pattaraṉ s
aijñātaṉamaikkum pārattuvāci mātevaṉ tiruvagniśvaramuṭaiyāṉ saijñā-taṉamaikku
paṭṭappuriyaṉ piraḷayaviṭaṇkaṉ tevaṉ māṭilaṉ civatevaṉ pālentiramavuli āstriyaṉ cūriyat
evaṉkolamākiṉiṉṟāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ saijñātaṉamaikku ṉāṉūṟṟu
vappiriyaṉ vācciyaṉ kumaraṉ porinātaṉ kumaraṉ pāratāyaṉ maticūtaṉ tiruv
eṇkāṭuṭaiyāṉ pārattuvāci mātevaṉ piraḷayaviṭaṇkaṉ māṭalaṉ civatevaṉ tiruva-ṉanti
nampi saijñātaṉamaikku aṣṭamutti nāṟpatteṇṇāyiraṉampi vācciyaṉ nak-kaṉ sai
jñātaṉamaikku acukuṭaiyāṉ tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyāṉ kāṇ
vūravāpā iṣabhatevaṉ kavuṇiyaṉ tevaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiy
āṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ||||
